Senator Joni Ernst (R-IA) issued an audio public service announcement (PSA) on the COVID-19 pandemic, encouraging Iowans to continue adhering to guidance from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) to limit the spread, flatten the curve, and to "stay safe and stay strong."

Full text of Senator Ernst's PSA to Iowans:

"Hello everyone, this is Senator Joni Ernst.
